Introduction

First of all I would like to thank you for purchasing Mimity admin template. I hope you like it and find it easy to work with.

This documentation is brief and may be lacking in some parts. If you think more explanations and examples are needed, just let me know.

Please send your questions, comments, suggestions and bug reports to me at erwin.heldy@gmail.com and I will try to reply as soon as possible.

Best Wishes
Erwin Heldy
